org.assertj.android.api.graphics.drawable

Class DrawableAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • org.assertj.android.api.graphics.drawable.AbstractDrawableAssert<DrawableAssert,android.graphics.drawable.Drawable>

  • public final class DrawableAssert
extends AbstractDrawableAssert<DrawableAssert,android.graphics.drawable.Drawable>
    Assertions for Drawable instances.

    This class is final. To extend use AbstractDrawableAssert.
